traits.name: Motivate
traits.desc: Target ally of lower level than you gains advantage against an ennemy of your choice. Their next attack deals an extra 4(2d4) damage if it hits that ennemy.

traits.name: Get back here you morons!
traits.desc: Up to 2 allies can move up to their movement to move toward you as a reaction. They can make a basic attack as part of this reaction if they end their movement within 5ft from you. You then gain +2 AC for each ally whithin 5 ft of you until the start of your next turn.

traits.name: Saving Face
traits.desc: They are careful not to show weakness in front of their allies, for fear of losing status. If you miss with an attack roll or fail an ability check or a saving throw, you can gain a bonus to the roll equal to the number of allies you can see within 30 feet of you (maximum bonus of +5). Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

traits.name: Jeweled Dagger
traits.desc: +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage.
